headline: Otis’s Q3 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Otis’ third quarter results reflected stable performance, with revenue and profit metrics surpassing Wall Street expectations. Management highlighted continued growth in the company’s Service segment, especially from maintenance, repair, and modernization activities. CEO Judith Marks attributed the quarter’s positive momentum to a 6% increase in Service sales and a 14% rise in modernization organic sales. She pointed out that service margin expansion and ongoing investment in operational improve
